hero.title: Hi, I'm Felix!
hero.p0: Software engineer by day, volleyball and rock climbing enthusiast by night
hero.des0: I'm a 4th year computer science student at the University of Waterloo and I specialize in software engineering. I've a strong desire to improve my skills and learn as much as I can.
hero.des1: I enjoy working in efficient team environments to create high-quality and impactful code. My strongest tech stack includes Python, Java, TypeScript and React. I value a supportive company culture and clear communication. I hope I would be able to integrate myself as part of your team easily!

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here's some cool stuff I made. Solo and team projects included :D

journal4me.subtitle: Journaling with a click of a button
journal4me.description: Transcribes video journal entries, summarizes, and generates color coded mood calendars with saved entries

badmintontt.subtitle: Track, Evaluate, Resolve
badmintontt.description: Tracking app that helped me determine team members to join my high school badminton team while I was team captain

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: These are the technologies I am familiar with. This list is always growing as I develop my career.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I had a great time at these companies. Hopefully I will be able to leave impactful code at your company too!

contact.title: Contact me!
contact.description: Shoot me a message! I appreciate you checking out my website especially since you've made it this far! I'd love to chat or connect :D
